title: "30 Chapters of Backstory" - Managing Story Arcs
itunes:title: "30 Chapters of Backstory" - Managing Story Arcs
description:
How do you manage story arcs within' your TTRPG campaigns? Do you pre-plan or let them grow organically? Do you tailor story arcs to your players & how do you make sure they pay off? Today we share our own triumphs & mistakes when managing story arcs & hopefully share some lessons learned.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.
